com.droidcare.control

Class AppointmentManager

  • Object
    • AppointmentManager
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConsultantAppointmentManager, PatientAppointmentManager

    public abstract class AppointmentManager
extends Object
    Fetches, stores and manages a list of Appointment objects.
    Author:
    Edwin Candinegara

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  AppointmentManager.OnFinishListener 

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private ArrayList<Appointment> acceptedAppointments
      A list of appointments which have been accepted by the consultants.
      private ArrayList<Appointment> finishedAppointments
      A list of appointments which have finished.
      private static AppointmentManager instance
      An instance of AppointmentManager.
      private ArrayList<Appointment> pendingAppointments
      A list of appointments which are active and have not been accepted by the consultants.
      private ArrayList<Appointment> rejectedAppointments
      A list of appointments which have been rejected by the consultants.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AppointmentManager()
      Constructs an AppointmentManager object and initiates all appointment lists.

      void retrieveAppointmentList(AppointmentManager.OnFinishListener onFinishListener)
      Fetches all appointments data related to this user and categorizes each appointment according to its status.
      void setAcceptedAppointmentAlarms(Context context)
      Set all accepted appointment "ALARM" to remind the patient and consultant for an appointment one day in advance.
      void setPendingAppointmentAlarms(Context context)
      Set all pending appointment "ALARM" to remind the consultant in case he/she still has some pending appointments which are going to due in 2 days.
      void updateMissedPendingAppointment(Context context)
      Set all missed pending appointment status to finished after the appointment date and time

    • Field Detail

      • instance

        private static AppointmentManager instance
        An instance of AppointmentManager. Use this to promote singleton design pattern. If the user is a patient, instantiate instance into a PatientAppointmentManager object. If the user is a consultant, instantiate instance into a ConsultantAppointmentManager object.

      • acceptedAppointments

        private ArrayList<Appointment> acceptedAppointments
        A list of appointments which have been accepted by the consultants.

      • pendingAppointments

        private ArrayList<Appointment> pendingAppointments
        A list of appointments which are active and have not been accepted by the consultants.

      • rejectedAppointments

        private ArrayList<Appointment> rejectedAppointments
        A list of appointments which have been rejected by the consultants.

      • finishedAppointments

        private ArrayList<Appointment> finishedAppointments
        A list of appointments which have finished.

      • setPendingAppointmentAlarms
